recipe.ingredients: - plain Greek yogurt: 1 cup (200g) - apple (sliced): 1 medium - mixed nuts (chopped, unsalted): 1/4 cup (approx. 28g) - cinnamon: 1/2 teaspoon - honey (optional): 1 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Apple: Wash and slice the apple into thin pieces. 2. Mix Ingredients: In a medium bowl, add the Greek yogurt. Top with sliced apples and chopped nuts. 3. Add Flavor: Sprinkle cinnamon over the top. If desired, drizzle a teaspoon of honey for a little sweetness. 4. Serve: Enjoy this delicious and nutritious snack right away, or refrigerate until ready to serve.
